pages.text: How many resources do you need to create a plane? Quite easy.$(br2)    Just go for mining and breaking every ore blocks you see under y 20 for 10 minutes and then craft a Plane Workbench. $(br2)    Some propellers, some planks, and your plane appears!

Don't have enough coals? Try Lava Bucket as plane fuels!$(br)    You should also craft one Explorer's Compass after you craft your first plane, and with the plane and the compass, Battle Towers are never difficult to find.$(br2)    By the way, there is a gold block under the Wither Storm Summoning Structure! Just pay a bit attention to finding the little structure when you are flying in the sky. You can use them to craft many golden apples!
